bibl.author: Donatien de Bruyne
bibl.title: Sommaires, divisions et rubriques de la Bible latine

msDesc.head: Biblia latina, Pentateuchus. 1st volume of Mordramnus' Bible
Biblia latina Veteris et Novi Testamenti

source.p: First period of the Turonian production according to Fischer's classification (p. 257).

listWit.witness: Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, lat. 11514 f. 22vb-23va
London, British Library, Harley 2805, f. 21r Integration by a later hand (12th century), beginning with title 94

msDesc.head: Biblia latina Veteris et Novi Testamenti

source.p: Third period of the Turonian production under Fridugisus (periode II) according to Fischer's classification (p. 261).

msDesc.head: Biblia latina Veteris et Novi Testamenti

source.p: Fourth period of the Turonian production under Fridugisus (periode II) according to Fischer's classification (p. 262).

msDesc.head: Biblia latina Veteris et Novi Testamenti

origin.origPlace: Tours, Abbey St. Martin or Marmoutier (Fischer)

source.p: Fourth period of the Turonian production under Fridugisus (periode II) according to Fischer's classification (p. 263).

msDesc.head: Biblia latina Veteris et Novi Testamenti

source.p: Second period of the Turonian production under Adelard (periode III) according to Fischer's classification (p. 264).
